WorkItem.Description:
The ZIP file for 1.7.7 is built incorrectly.  Instead of unarchiving into directories, all the file names have a windows path structure in the file name itself.  For instance:
 
"Classes\PHPExcel\CachedObjectStorage\APC.php"  
 
That's not the path, that's the actual file name as it has been unzipped.
WorkItem.Summary: Zip File is Built Incorrectly for Linux & Mac Users

Comments.Message:
Hi,

I have uploaded the modified zip file here. It should work on Mac. Haven't tested on Linux yet.
Please let me know if this doesn't work for you.

You can download from here: http://customsoftware.com.sg/phpexcel-zip-file-for-mac/

(Couldn't attach below due to file size restriction.)

Best regards,
Tony.
